author: Theron Mohamed
title: Boeing Workers in First Strike Since 2008 That Could Cost It Billions - Business Insider
text:
Boeing workers are set to strike — and it could cost the company billions
Read in app
- Boeing workers are striking for the first time since 2008.
- The walkout could cost the embattled planemaker billions in lost revenue if it drags on for months.
- Analysts say Boeing tends to mitigate the fallout by delaying orders instead of canceling them.
Sign up to get the inside scoop on today’s biggest stories in markets, tech, and business — delivered daily.
Read preview
Boeing is facing its first strike in 16 years — and it could deal a billion-dollar blow to the planemaker if it drags on.
More than 30,000
factory workersare poised to walk outstarting Friday morning after the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) overwhelmingly voted to reject a tentative labor agreementwith Boeing, and to go on strike in pursuit of a better deal.
Boeing's
last strike in 2008went on for almost two months, causing the company to deliver about 70 fewer commercial aircraft than usual in the affected quarter. The walkout depressed revenues in the period by $4.3 billion, Boeing said at the time.
Another strike of that length would cost Boeing at least $3 billion, according to a TD Cowen research note cited by The New York Times.
Jefferies analysts estimated a 30-day cash impact of $1.5 billion, and warned a strike "could destabilize suppliers and supply chains," CNBC reported. The rejected deal would have cost Boeing an extra $900 million a year if passed, they noted.
A Boeing strike in 1989 cost the company $2.5 billion in lost revenue, and the next one in 2005 cost it about $1 billion, the American Action Forum
noted in a paper this week. However, the conservative-leaning policy-analysis nonprofit said that Boeing might make some of that money later instead of missing out on it entirely.
Related stories
"While strikes, especially recent ones, have been costly, there is no clear trend in how they have affected year-to-year revenue," the AAF researchers wrote. "This may be because Boeing generally delays orders rather than losing them, so their revenue is time-shifted rather than diminished."
Even so, they noted the pending strike could be especially painful given Boeing
recently agreed to a plea dealtied to the crashes of two 737 Max planes. If approved by a judge, the agreement would see Boeing pay a $244 million fine and invest an extra $455 million in compliance and safety programs.
"Considering the cost of the previous two strikes, combined with legal troubles related to manufacturing issues, a strike at this juncture could be particularly damaging," the AAF analysts said.
Boeing is also weathering turbulence after the
midair blowoutof a door plug on one of its planes in January, which sparked investigations that revealed broad-based safety and quality issues and prompted regulatory restrictionson production. The company's Starliner space program has been hit by safety concerns too.
The manufacturing titan employs nearly 150,000 people nationwide and ranks among the largest US exporters, meaning a strike that halts its operations could hit the broader economy along with its bottom line.
"While past IAM strikes have had relatively little effect on Boeing's revenue, the ripple effects of a future IAM strike against Boeing could indeed create significant disruption for the local economy and reverberate throughout the national supply chain," the AAF paper reads.
Boeing CEO
Kelly Ortberg, who only took overthe company's controls in August, and his team said on Thursday they're prepared to return to the negotiating table. Quickly ending the strike would minimize its financial impact.
Read next
News Boeing Regulation

organizations.name: international association of machinists and aerospace workers

author: Staff Reporter
title: Vivianne Miedema comes off the bench to fire Manchester City into first-leg lead
text:
Substitute Vivianne Miedema scored a brace as Manchester City inflicted Chelsea’s first defeat of the season by beating them 2-0 in their Champions League quarter-final first leg at the Joie Stadium.
Miedema, having come off the bench for the start of the second half, put City in front on the hour mark, rifling in the rebound when Hannah Hampton tipped Laia Aleixandri’s header against the crossbar.
And after Chelsea substitute Johanna Rytting Kaneryd had struck the bar at the other end in the 80th minute, Miedema added her second with two minutes of normal time remaining to give City a two-goal advantage heading into next Thursday’s second leg at Stamford Bridge.
That match will complete a series of four successive meetings between the sides, which started with Chelsea’s 2-1 triumph on Saturday in the League Cup final at Pride Park that gave them their first trophy under boss Sonia Bompastor.
They have now suffered a maiden loss of the Frenchwoman’s tenure, ending an unbeaten run of 28 games since she took charge last summer – of which 26 were wins – and 31 matches in total.
City, meanwhile, have a first win of Nick Cushing’s interim tenure after he replaced Gareth Taylor ahead of the quartet of fixtures, which continues with Sunday’s Women’s Super League clash at the Etihad Stadium.
With Khadija Shaw and Aoba Fujino dropping out having come off with injuries in Saturday’s contest, Kerolin and 19-year-old Lily Murphy came into City’s starting attack, while Cushing also opted to replace Miedema with Jess Park.
Bompastor made two changes which included former City midfielder Keira Walsh returning to Chelsea’s line-up after three games out.
Cushing had spoken about Saturday’s result serving as “fuel” for his team, and City started brightly as Kerolin shot over and Jill Roord’s strike was gathered by Hampton.
Chelsea registered an attempt with Nathalie Bjorn’s header being saved by Ayaka Yamashita before Hampton was called upon again twice in quick succession just prior to the half-hour, dealing with efforts from Murphy and Mary Fowler.
A Chelsea burst forward soon after ended with Catarina Macario heading over from Lauren James’ cross, and the opening stages of the second half saw efforts from James and Roord saved.
City then broke the deadlock when Aleixandri sent a header goalwards from Fowler’s delivery, Hampton did well to divert it against the woodwork and Miedema, who had replaced Murphy at the break, was on hand to crack the loose ball home from close range.
After Miedema saw a further shot parried by Hampton, Chelsea had the ball in the net in the 71st minute as Mayra Ramirez slotted in, but the flag went up for offside.
The visitors continued to push for a leveller and Rytting Kaneryd’s shot came back off the bar and fellow substitute Weike Kaptein saw an effort parried by Yamashita, before Miedema struck again as stoppage time drew near, slotting into the corner having been fed by Kerolin.

author: LesEco.ma
title: Anass Moutaoukil : «L'inauguration de cette plateforme est une étape majeure dans notre développement»
text:
Anass Moutaoukil
Directeur général de BLS
Au sud-est de Casablanca, Buildings and Logistic Services (BLS) vient d’inaugurer officiellement BLS Casa Hub, une plateforme logistique de pointe dans la province de Médiouna. L’évènement s’est déroulé en présence d’Abdessamad Kayouh, ministre du Transport et de la Logistique.
Quels objectifs H&S Invest Holding vise-t-il avec l’inauguration de BLS Casa Hub ?
Cette plateforme, aujourd’hui la plus grande plateforme privée de prestations logistiques au Maroc, a pour objectif de servir les clients aux meilleurs standards et d’offrir des services clients de façon intégrée. C’est une étape majeure dans notre développement. Avec cette plateforme, nous atteignons environ 450.000 m² d’actifs logistiques gérés, ainsi que l’équivalent de 250.000 positions palettes. Notre ambition est de continuer à développer des infrastructures et des services intégrés pour offrir à nos clients une chaîne logistique complète et compétitive.
Le choix de l’emplacement semble stratégique. Quels atouts spécifiques justifient ce choix ?
Le choix de cette zone est également crucial. Il repose sur sa localisation stratégique. Nous sommes à proximité immédiate de la route nationale numéro 9, à seulement six minutes de l’autoroute, 25 minutes du port et 15 minutes de l’aéroport. Cet emplacement optimise les flux logistiques, qu’ils proviennent du port ou des axes sud et nord du Maroc.
Cette inauguration marque-t-elle une étape clé vers votre ambition de devenir un fournisseur de services intégrés ? Et envisagez-vous un passage à la logistique de 5PL prochainement ?
Nous sommes aujourd’hui un prestataire intégré de 3PL, ce qui répond aux besoins actuels de nos clients. Toutefois, certains clients sont déjà en transition vers le 4PL, nous demandent de gérer leur logistique depuis l’importation des produits, en passant par le transport, le stockage, et jusqu’à la distribution finale. Nous nous préparons également à l’arrivée du 5PL, grâce à notre transformation digitale. Celle-ci nous permet d’interconnecter toutes nos solutions métiers via un portail unique, offrant à nos clients une gestion fluide de leurs opérations logistiques avec les meilleurs standards et services.
En quoi cette nouvelle plateforme renforce-t-elle votre avantage concurrentiel ?
Si l’on prend par exemple la plateforme que nous venons d’inaugurer, elle se distingue par sa hauteur exceptionnelle de 17,5 mètres, permettant un stockage sur sept niveaux. Cette configuration optimise le nombre de positions palettes par mètre carré, ce qui nous aide à réduire les coûts.
Cette optimisation en amont nous permet de proposer des solutions compétitives à nos clients. Nous recherchons constamment des solutions innovantes pour diminuer les coûts et encourager nos partenaires, notamment les multinationales, à externaliser leur logistique. Pour y parvenir, il est essentiel de disposer de plateformes comme celle-ci, conçues pour optimiser les coûts dès leur mise en service.
Faiza Rhoul / Les Inspirations ÉCO

author: salomea.
title: cosa dicono gli ultimi studi sul virus H5N1?
text: Perché il caso del ragazzo positivo al virus H5N1 in Canada, attualmente ricoverato in terapia intensiva, preoccupa le autorità sanitarie? La sua vita è già attualmente in sospeso. Le équipe mediche stanno cercando di capire come e da cosa sia stato contaminato. I test vengono effettuati sugli animali domestici che lo circondano e anche sulle persone che lo circondano. Come misura preventiva, alle persone intorno al giovane sono stati somministrati farmaci antivirali. L’indagine sarà decisiva e le conclusioni potrebbero cambiare le nostre certezze, ovvero che la contaminazione da uomo a uomo non è stata ancora dimostrata. Da qui la preoccupazione delle autorità sanitarie canadesi. Come si è diffuso il virus H5N1 e qual è la sua evoluzione? Proviene dagli uccelli selvatici, prima di essere trasmesso agli uccelli domestici, ad esempio le anatre. Attualmente nelle Lande si registrano due focolai di influenza aviaria. Ora sappiamo che si trasmette ai mammiferi; le foche in Cile sono state contaminate nel 2023, poi le mucche negli Stati Uniti. Anche i gatti della fattoria sono stati infettati dopo aver bevuto latte vaccino crudo. Ed è un fenomeno sorprendente: osservare che il latte crudo contiene il virus. Ovviamente il latte pastorizzato è esente da qualsiasi rischio. Molto recentemente, il virus H5N1 è stato trovato in un maiale negli Stati Uniti. Mutazioni del tuo virus Infatti, questo virus H5N1 si adatta e muta regolarmente. Quando potrebbe essere causa di contagio tra esseri umani? È un’ipotesi. Possiamo notare che questo virus ha una mutazione in una proteina PB2 che si adatta ai mammiferi, il fatto che un maiale sia stato contaminato non è una buona notizia, perché sappiamo che il maiale è l’intermediario tra i virus umani e quelli degli uccelli. Esiste infatti il timore che i maiali trasmettano all’uomo un virus adattato o mutato, il che porterebbe a una pandemia. I maiali hanno causato epidemie umane? Nel 2009 scoppia la cosiddetta epidemia “messicana” dell’influenza A, causata dal sottotipo H1N1: quattro diversi virus ricombinanti. Questa volta possiamo temere la ricombinazione dell’H5N1, attraverso i maiali, perché no? Gli scienziati stanno attualmente valutando questa possibilità, finora nulla è stato dimostrato. Nel caso in cui diventasse possibile una pandemia H5N1, quali sarebbero le soluzioni? Gli Stati Uniti stanno analizzando le acque fognarie ed effettuando test PCR per misurare la possibile presenza del virus, sapendo che sono state trovate tracce nelle acque fognarie delle Hawaii, ma al momento è impossibile sapere se queste tracce di virus provengano da animali, uccelli o uomini… Gli americani hanno uno stock federale di vaccini contro l’H5N1 e il laboratorio Moderna sta sintetizzando un vaccino a RNA contro l’H5N1, in Europa anche altri due laboratori stanno lavorando per produrre vaccini. Siamo in attesa. Il rischio che questo virus si adatti all’uomo esiste, non bisogna essere allarmisti ma realisti.

author: Marta Almarcha
title: La «operación salida» contará con fuertes lluvias y tormentas: avisos naranjas y granizo | Eltiempo.es
text: La «operación salida» contará con fuertes lluvias y tormentas: avisos naranjas y granizo La operación salida de agosto para muchos podría verse marcada por chubascos y tormentas en algunas zonas, incluso con granizo Marta Almarcha La vaguada que va a cruzar la península en las próximas horas va a aumentar la [inestabilidad en forma de chubascos y tormentas.](https://www.eltiempo.es/noticias/agosto-llegara-tormentoso-una-vaguada-trae-lluvia-y-alivio-del-calor) En las próximas horas, operación salida de agosto para muchos la situación podría complicarse en zonas del nordeste. Esperamos que se formen chubascos que pueden ser fuertes, acompañados de tormentas, granizo y fuertes rachas de viento. Esta situación hace que tengamos activos [avisos amarillos y naranjas](https://www.eltiempo.es/avisos) hasta en 4 comunidades. ¿Dónde va a llover hoy? Una operación salida con chubascos Los primeros chubascos ya se están produciendo en Castilla y León, País Vasco y La Rioja. Con el paso de las horas se irán extendiendo por más regiones del norte peninsular, intensificándose por la tarde en el nordeste. ¿Dónde va a llover? En el entorno de la Cantábrica, Navarra, Madrid, amplias zonas de Aragón, Cataluña y norte de la Comunidad Valenciana. Las lluvias más intensas podrían dejar acumulados de más de 15 o 20 mm en solo 1 hora en Parameras de Molina, Teruel, interior de Castellón, Lleida, Girona y Barcelona. Avisos naranjas: fuertes tormentas con granizo Estos chubascos podrán ir acompañados también de fuertes [ tormentas](https://www.eltiempo.es/noticias/meteopedia/tormenta), que localmente pueden dejar [granizo](https://www.eltiempo.es/noticias/meteopedia/granizo). El granizo incluso podría ser de gran tamaño y las rachas de viento podrían ser muy fuertes en estas zonas de tormenta. Avisos naranjas por fuertes tormentas y granizo en Teruel, Castellón, Barcelona y Girona Los avisos naranjas por fuertes tormentas y granizo se activan en Gúdar y Maestrazgo, interior de Castellón, en la depresión central de Barcelona, prepirineo de Barcelona y en el Pirineo de Girona. Esta situación remitirá a últimas horas del día, con la vaguada alejándose por el este. De madrugada no se descarta algún chubasco al norte de Baleares. Tanto el sábado como el domingo habrá más estabilidad, aunque podrían formarse tormentas ambas tardes en zonas altas del interior oriental peninsular.

author: time news
title: Health Benefits of Celery: How It Can Help You Lose Weight and Boost Your Metabolism - timenews
text: 2024-01-05 20:00:00 Title: How Celery Can Help You Slim Down By: Judith Braun January 5, 2024, 7:00 p.m If you want to shed a few pounds, incorporating celery into your diet may be the solution. This green vegetable is a powerful slimming agent that can aid in weight loss. Celery is packed with essential nutrients such as vitamins and minerals including vitamin C, vitamin A, B vitamins, vitamin K, potassium, calcium, sodium, and phosphorus. These nutrients support metabolism and the immune system, making celery an ideal addition to any diet. With only 16 calories per 100 grams and consisting of around 75 percent water, celery is an excellent choice for those looking to lose weight. The high fiber content also aids in digestion and can help eliminate toxic substances from the body. For those looking to incorporate celery into their weight loss regimen, a celery diet typically lasts two to four weeks. This may include consuming pure celery juice or a celery shake made with ingredients like ginger, green apple, and lemon juice. For those who are time-crunched, organic celery juice is also available to order in cure-compatible three liters, making it a convenient option for those looking to integrate celery into their weight loss plan. However, it’s important to note that crash diets or cures that solely involve drinking celery juice should be avoided. Instead, celery should be used as part of a balanced and healthy diet, avoiding processed foods and opting for low-sugar meals. While celery can be a beneficial component of a weight loss plan, it’s important to consult with a healthcare professional before making any major changes to your diet. This article is for informational purposes and should not be used for self-diagnosis or treatment. In conclusion, celery can be a valuable tool for anyone looking to shed a few pounds. With its array of nutrients and low caloric content, it’s a versatile vegetable that can be incorporated in a variety of ways to support weight loss goals.] #green #vegetables

author: Caracol Radio"/>
title: Villa de Leyva ha sido la sede del Festival de las Ideas por tres años consecutivos
text:
Durante tres años consecutivos, Villa de Leyva (Boyacá) ha sido la sede del Festival de las Ideas , un encuentro organizado por Prisa Media que invita a conversar a cientos de líderes del país alrededor de los temas más importantes de la agenda nacional.
Este año, el Festival estuvo centrado en temas como la sostenibilidad corporativa, el papel político que juegan los líderes empresariales , la tecnocracia y la necesidad de lograr un gran Acuerdo Nacional intersectorial .
“ El hecho de reunirnos en un mismo lugar tres años consecutivos en torno al mismo objetivo permite avanzar significativamente hacia la transformación que tanto reclama la ciudadanía ”. aseguró Ramiro Barragán, gobernador de Boyacá, sobre el encuentro.
Líderes de todos los sectores coincidieron en que este tipo de espacios son cruciales para nutrir el debate público y conocer las reflexiones que están ocurriendo alrededor de los grandes cambios que requiere el país en materia social, económica, política y ambiental.
“ Sabemos que esta tierra Boyacá , tierra de paz, inspira un ambiente de trabajo productivo y armonioso para intentar, como siempre, brindar un mejor futuro a las nuevas generaciones ”, concluyó el mandatario en su discurso de apertura del evento.

author: Jennifer Detlinger
title: O encanto e beleza dos famosos jardins de tulipas coloridas na Holanda vão te surpreender
text:
Os Jardins de Keukenhof, localizados em Lisse, nos arredores de Amsterdã, são um dos principais atrativos da primavera na Holanda. Este espetacular parque floral atrai visitantes de todo o mundo, ansiosos para admirar a vasta coleção de tulipas e outras flores que desabrocham em um cenário que parece saído de um conto de fadas. Em 2025, o festival ocorrerá entre 20 de março e 11 de maio, prometendo mais uma vez encantar todos os que o visitam.
Embora as tulipas sejam o principal destaque, os Jardins de Keukenhof oferecem uma diversidade impressionante de flores. Com 32 hectares de área, o parque é meticulosamente planejado ao longo do ano, com sete milhões de bulbos plantados manualmente por uma equipe dedicada de jardineiros. Fundado em 1949, o Keukenhof é um testemunho da rica tradição holandesa no cultivo de tulipas, apresentando cerca de 800 variedades diferentes dessa flor icônica.
Quais são as atrações dos Jardins de Keukenhof?
Além dos belos jardins ao ar livre, Keukenhof oferece uma variedade de exposições em pavilhões que apresentam diferentes tipos de flores. O parque também é um destino familiar, com atrações para crianças, como playgrounds, uma fazendinha, um labirinto e caças ao tesouro. Para os que desejam uma experiência mais aprofundada, há passeios guiados que explicam sobre as plantas, métodos de cultivo e a história das tulipas na Holanda.
Os visitantes podem explorar o parque de várias maneiras. Passeios de bicicleta e de barco são opções populares, permitindo uma visão única dos campos floridos ao redor. Os passeios de barco, em particular, oferecem uma perspectiva tranquila e pitoresca dos canais que circundam o parque.
Como chegar aos Jardins de Keukenhof?
Chegar aos Jardins de Keukenhof é relativamente fácil, com várias opções de transporte disponíveis. Ônibus partem da estação de trem RAI – Europaplein em Amsterdã, oferecendo um ingresso combinado que inclui a entrada no parque e o transporte de ida e volta. Alternativamente, há ônibus saindo do Aeroporto de Schipol e da cidade de Leiden. Para aqueles que preferem dirigir, o estacionamento está disponível mediante pagamento antecipado.
Os visitantes são aconselhados a planejar sua visita para evitar as multidões, já que o parque recebe cerca de 800 mil visitantes por mês. Visitar cedo pela manhã ou no final da tarde pode proporcionar uma experiência mais tranquila e agradável.
Por que os Jardins de Keukenhof são tão populares?
Os Jardins de Keukenhof são uma celebração da beleza natural e da habilidade humana em horticultura. A popularidade do parque pode ser atribuída à sua capacidade de capturar a essência da primavera em um espetáculo visual deslumbrante. A tradição das tulipas na Holanda, que remonta ao século 17, continua a fascinar visitantes, tornando Keukenhof um destino imperdível para amantes de flores e entusiastas de jardinagem.
Além disso, a experiência de caminhar por entre os canteiros floridos, admirando a variedade de cores e formas, é algo que deixa uma impressão duradoura. Os Jardins de Keukenhof não são apenas um lugar para ver flores, mas um espaço para se conectar com a natureza e apreciar a arte da jardinagem em sua forma mais pura.

author: @1011_news
title: 4-year-old and infant in Colorado found safe after endangered missing alert
text: 4-year-old and infant in Colorado found safe after endangered missing alert STERLING, Colo. ( [KKTV](https://www.kktv.com/2023/12/28/statewide-alert-issued-colorado-missing-4-year-old-infant/)/Gray News) - A statewide alert issued in Colorado on Thursday for two young children has been canceled, [KKTV reports.](https://www.kktv.com/2023/12/28/statewide-alert-issued-colorado-missing-4-year-old-infant/) The Colorado Bureau of Investigation issued an alert for 4-year-old Zuryah Thalacker and 23-month-old Ansom Thalacker. Officials say the two children were located and were safe as of 3 p.m. on Thursday. Officials say the children have been missing since Wednesday at 1:30 p.m. when they were last seen in the Sterling area. The alert stated that the children may have been with 28-year-old Justina Lambert. The CBI did not disclose the relationship between the three in the alert. The alert said the children were believed to be traveling in a 2007 White Nissan Murano with CA license plate 9ERA912, with the rear bumper missing. Copyright 2023 KKTV via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Mauricio Herrera
title: 'Daredevil' de Netflix es canon en el MCU: 'Echo' confirma que la serie de Disney+ continúa en la misma línea temporal
text: En tan solo unos días tendremos [el estreno de 'Echo'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/cine-y-tv/este-trailer-echo-primer-serie-para-adultos-marvel-disney-plus-que-estrenara-todos-sus-capitulos-forma-simultanea), la nueva serie de Marvel Studios que será la primera producción con clasificación para adultos de este universo y que continúa los hechos vistos en ['Hawkeye'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fhawkeye%2F11Zy8m9Dkj5l&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700). Suscripción a Disney+ Hace unos días, Screen Rant tuvo la oportunidad de [platicar ](https://screenrant.com/netflix-daredevil-mcu-canon-timeline-marvel-producer/)con Brad Winderbaum, productor ejecutivo de varias series de [Disney+](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fhome&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700), donde en su opinión, el Daredevil interpretado por Charlie Cox era el mismo que vimos en 'Spider-Man: No Way Home' y ['She-Hulk'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fshe-hulk-defensora-de-heroes%2FgPwaYusKqRQh&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700), tomando en cuenta la Línea Sagrada del Tiempo. Aunque esta declaración venía de un alto ejecutivo, al final fueron palabras a título personal. Eso cambió hasta hace unas horas cuando [Marvel reveló el nuevo trailer de 'Echo'](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g0f1o-KGWPM), donde al inicio del video podemos ver al villano Kingpin en algunas de las escenas de la serie de Netflix, además de que el mismo video nos avisa que esta [también se puede ver en Disney+](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fdaredevil%2F5jKSWL7ZMg50&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700). Además, [se confirmó](https://twitter.com/disneyplusla/status/1743373236002238604?s=20) que al igual que en Estados Unidos donde 'Echo' será por primera vez un lanzamiento simultáneo en Disney+ y Hulu, pasará lo mismo en México y Latinoamérica, con la diferencia de que aquí compartirá el contenido con Star+, apuntando a que así ocurrirá con más series hasta que [la fusión de ambas plataformas ](https://www.xataka.com.mx/streaming/disney-plus-star-plus-se-fusionaran-mexico-mezcla-esperada-streaming-llegara-a-nuevo-precio-que-permanece-incognito)esté completa. Las series de Netflix regresan al MCU Si bien Marvel Studios se encargaba de producir las películas principales del MCU, había otros sectores de la compañía trabajando en Más proyectos. Por ejemplo, Marvel Television llevó a la pantalla chica series como ['Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fagentes-de-shield%2F2UT4VQrwpVgi&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700) y las diferentes entregas de Netflix, incluyendo ['Daredevil'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fdaredevil%2F5jKSWL7ZMg50&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700), ['Jessica Jones'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fjessica-jones%2F4LX4rNmINp5y&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700), ['The Punisher'](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2Fes-419%2Fseries%2Fthe-punisher%2F6JOZHgU6cBS3&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700) y más. En un principio, estas se consideraban dentro del canon del universo cinematográfico, pero poco a poco fueron desapareciendo las menciones dentro de las mismas producciones como de guías oficiales. Por ejemplo, en el libro de los [10 años de Marvel Studios](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com.mx%2FMarvel-Studios-Definitive-Behind-Blockbuster%2Fdp%2F1419732447%2Fref%3Dsr_1_12%3F__mk_es_MX%3D%25C3%2585M%25C3%2585%25C5%25BD%25C3%2595%25C3%2591%26crid%3D1RN4UODVGJGDD%26keywords%3Dlibro%2Bmarvel%2Bstudios%26qid%3D1704497551%26sprefix%3Dlibro%2Bmarvel%2Bstudi%252Caps%252C164%26sr%3D8-12%26ufe%3Dapp_do%253Aamzn1.fos.4e545b5e-1d45-498b-8193-a253464ffa47&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700) y el que explica [la línea del tiempo del MCU](https://www.xataka.com.mx/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com.mx%2FStudios-Cinematic-Universe-Official-Timeline%2Fdp%2F074408167X%2Fref%3Dsr_1_1%3F__mk_es_MX%3D%25C3%2585M%25C3%2585%25C5%25BD%25C3%2595%25C3%2591%26crid%3D1RN4UODVGJGDD%26keywords%3Dlibro%2Bmarvel%2Bstudios%26qid%3D1704497536%26sprefix%3Dlibro%2Bmarvel%2Bstudi%252Caps%252C164%26sr%3D8-1%26ufe%3Dapp_do%253Aamzn1.fos.4e545b5e-1d45-498b-8193-a253464ffa47&category=streaming&ecomPostExpiration=perish&postId=201700), no se hace mención de estos shows. Aunque por ahora solo se puede confirmar que 'Daredevil' está de regreso, faltará ver si otros proyectos de Marvel toman en cuenta de ahora en adelante.
